jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for a Psychology Intern Student,

Responsibilities

Communicating with clients via office phone
Greeting Clients
Support in making appointments

Qualifications

*Student in the 3rd or 4th year of a Psychology undergraduate degree.

*Interested and curious about the clinical field.

*Creative who can use applications such as Canva and Word

*Possess verbal communication skills.

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist (Turkey)
jobListings.description:
Hiwell is Turkey's largest online therapy platform, founded to help clients know themselves better, feel better, and develop a more positive outlook on life. With a pool of 1,000 psychologists and preferred by more than 350,000 clients, we aim to build the healthiest communication between clients and expert psychologists through our website and mobile app.

How Do We Work?

Thanks to our mobile app, our clients can receive services from our expert psychologists faster and more practically. To provide the best service to our clients, we work with psychologists who are experts in their fields. Our top priority is that our expert psychologist team consists of psychologists who have completed their master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couple Therapy, have supervision experience, and prioritize ethical work.

Hiwell offers a fully online working environment. Therefore, you have the freedom to work from any city at any time.

‚óè Graduated from the psychology department,
‚óè Holds a master‚Äôs degree in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couple Therapy,
‚óè Proficient in therapy applications,
‚óè Has experience in client follow-up,
‚óè Familiar with methods and technologies related to the field,
‚óè Has received or is receiving supervision,
‚óè Values ethical principles

If you meet the above qualifications, we look forward to receiving your application!

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for a Clinical Psychologist with a client portfolio who adheres to ethical principles to work with us at Nutrimind Healthy Living Center. The agreement will be made through room rental or commission.

Qualifications:

Completed bachelor's in psychology + master's in clinical psychology
Completed or ongoing supervision process
Strong communication skills, team-oriented
Open to collaboration with nutritionists (seminars, joint projects, etc.)
Interested in/learning about eating behavior
Underwent or is undergoing personal therapy
Adheres to professional ethics and principles
Trained in at least one psychotherapy approach
Currently has a client portfolio.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for psychologists and clinical psychologists who want to expand and grow their client network to support users as experts on our platform.

Who Are We?

Eczacƒ±ba≈üƒ± Evital is an online healthcare platform established within Eczacƒ±ba≈üƒ± Holding, preferred by over 50,000 clients. Our platform aims to establish the healthiest communication between clients and psychologists, dietitians, and doctors through our website and mobile app.

What does Evital offer to healthcare professionals and service providers?

Ability to set working schedules and consultation options by the healthcare professional
Online consultations with clients from anywhere with internet access
Effortless management of processes like payments and invoicing along with consultations

Requirements:

We are looking for psychologists/clinical psychologists to join our platform.

If you have a degree in psychology,
Have the license and education to conduct therapy,
Are proficient in therapy applications,
Have experience in client follow-up,
Keep up with methods and technologies related to your field,
Preferably can issue invoices,
Have received or are receiving supervision,
Value ethical principles

We are eagerly awaiting your application!

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for a psychologist who has completed a 4-year psychology degree and a master's in clinical psychology, has at least 3 years of experience as a psychotherapist, and keeps up with scientific developments in their field. The ideal candidate should be skilled in working with children aged 0-3 and be proficient in the WISC-IV assessment.

Flexibility in working days (including Saturdays) and hours is required, along with strong communication skills and a positive attitude outside of therapeutic settings.

jobListings.title: Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Mandatory conditions
- Having a bachelor's degree in psychology AND a master's degree in clinical psychology,
 Having at least three years of professional experience in the field of child/adolescent, adult or family mental health
 Having received training in at least one movement (CBT, schema, EMDR),
 Having client experience,

Expectations:
Seeing and following up with clients

Conditions that will be a reason for preference
 Having a good command of English
 Having followed up with clients under the supervision of a supervisor

Clinic Features
 Our family counseling center is licensed in accordance with the legal regulations and provides counseling services to children/adolescents, adults and families,

 All of the practices carried out in our center are evidence-based and in accordance with ethical principles.

jobListings.title: Intern
jobListings.description: We are looking for a voluntary intern who is either a psychology student or graduate. No experience is required. The internship duration varies between 1 to 2 months.

jobListings.title: Expert Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
As Happy Life Psychological Counseling Center, we are looking for a part-time clinical psychologist to join our team! üåü

üîç Required Qualifications:

- Master's degree in Clinical Psychology,
- At least 1 year of experience,
- Flexible with working hours,
- Competent to provide therapy to children, adolescents, adults, and couples,
- Embracing multi-disciplinary work,
- Strong skills in teamwork, planning, organization, problem-solving, result-orientedness, and communication,
- Proficient in cognitive-behavioral, supportive, and solution-focused therapy; preferably trained in schema therapy, couple therapy, EMDR therapy, sexual therapy, or child-centered play therapy (child-centered play therapy, experiential play therapy, Theraplay play therapy, Floor time play therapy), and actively applying these therapies in sessions while continuously enhancing knowledge through recent training,
- Following and implementing innovations and current methods related to the field,
- Able to write blog posts on psychology topics, strong in transferring knowledge into writing, and able to create informative videos for social media,
- Having strong presentation skills.
